Hi,


I am using
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter for
getting the test results in a xml file. 


            TestResult result = new TestResult();


XMLJUnitResultFormatter resultFormatter = new XMLJUnitResultFormatter();


            OutputStream writer = new FileOutputStream(new
File("C:/reports.xml"));


            resultFormatter.setOutput(writer);


            result.addListener(resultFormatter);


 


            TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();


            Test aTest = new MyTest("testMethod");


            suite.addTest(aTest);


            suite.run(result);


 


            writer.close();


 


I don't get anything in reports.xml. Am I missing something ?


 


Cheers


yogesh
